Recursive Sans
Linear Regular
15pt
p1 x0 W400 i0 c0
  • font-size: 144px; /* Weight: Light to Heavy. Can be defined with usual font-weight property. */
  • /* style axes */
  • font-weight: 400;
  • --prop: "PROP" 0; Mono Sans
  • --xprn: "XPRN" 0;
  • --ital: "ital" 0;
  • --crsv: "CRSV" 0; Off Auto On
  • /* use CSS custom properties */
  • font-variation-settings: var(--prop), var(--xprn), var(--ital), var(--crsv);
